courseDescription:
This course on Angular directives walks you through creating a highlight directive that sets the background colour of the host element to yellow. This course provides accurate knowledge of changing the appearance or behaviour of DOM elements and Angular components with attribute directives. We explain and describe the tools' characteristics and functions and guide you through specific information about writing structural directives, providing an understanding of conceptual information on how directives work. We supply the answers to questions relating to Angular's built-in structural directives. We discuss creating an application and the tools you will use before teaching you to assess the various ways of adding and modifying Angular directives.

Following this, we prepare you for the types of tools you will need to develop your different directives. First, you will be able to learn how to use the tools in ‘Nglf Structural Directive’ correctly and the ‘NgFor Structural Directive’, including understanding what mistakes to avoid. Next, you will discover how to troubleshoot the errors to have a thriving operational directive. Finally, learn how to set up component directives and what Angular directives and DOM elements are used for.

This course will supply you with the aptitude required to use Angular directives as a beginner. It provides precise and detailed procedures you can apply in your working field. This course is ideal for those starting to use Angular directives or employees who want to learn how to use it to its full potential.
